item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 16, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. YC is wrong about LLMs for chip design (111 points | 66 comments)
2. Astronomers find 2 galaxies aligned where their gravity acts as a compound lens (21 points | 3 comments)
3. Is the UK's liver transplant matching algorithm biased against younger patients? (24 points | 7 comments)
4. Ask HN: What open source projects need help? (42 points | 10 comments)
5. Yggdrasil Network (145 points | 56 comments)
6. M4 Macs can't virtualise older macOS (98 points | 57 comments)

9. Thoughtworks Technology Radar Oct 2024 – From Coding Assistance to AI Evolution (26 points | 10 comments)

13. Apple Smells Blood in the Water (56 points | 37 comments)

23. MomBoard: E-ink display for a parent with amnesia (2003 points | 240 comments)

25. Tsugaru OS – A New Free FM-Towns OS (103 points | 15 comments)
26. Netflix buffering issues: Boxing fans complain about Jake Paul vs. Mike Tyson (266 points | 464 comments)
27. The Taming of the Screw (2000) (46 points | 8 comments)

29. Hackers use ZIP file concatenation to evade detection (188 points | 83 comments)
30. Show HN: ZQDGR a Script Runner for Golang (13 points | 2 comments)
